name: Marketing
samplePrompt: Draft a concise product announcement leveraging the selected context.

chunks.title: Persona: Growth PMs
chunks.body: Time-constrained decision makers who value clear ROI, dashboards, and quick pilots.

chunks.title: Key Features
chunks.body: Realtime analytics, AI summarization, collaboration, role-based access control.

chunks.title: Tone & Style
chunks.body: Confident, friendly, concise. Avoid jargon. Emphasize benefits over features.

chunks.title: Launch Offer
chunks.body: 30-day free trial; priority onboarding for first 100 signups.

chunks.title: Target Channels
chunks.body: LinkedIn, Product Hunt, email to opt-in beta waitlist.
